channel.title: Vincente-Huidobro on Noah Mazer
channel.description: Recent content in Vincente-Huidobro on Noah Mazer

item.title: Vincente Huidobro - Elegy for the Death of Lenin
item.description: [Elegia para la muerte de Lenin] Greater than the song of life greater than death itself greater than the pain of memory greater than the anguish of time is your presence in the soul of the world. You, heights-scaling man You, heart of tamed fires entering the tomb you were like a sudden sun in winter you were like a summer in death with you, death becomes greater than life.
